title: 1013 Overcome Shame, Process Pain & Maximize Mental Health w/Lori Gottlieb
description:
“If we don’t rewrite our story, we relive our story.”

Lori Gottlieb is a psychotherapist and the author of "Maybe You Should Talk to Someone." In today's interview, she discusses tools to help you heal from a difficult past, the importance of "wise compassion" when dealing with those you love, and why you should look yourself in the mirror for 60 seconds every day.

Mel Robbins: The “Secret” Mindset Habit to Building Confidence and Overcoming Scarcity: https://link.chtbl.com/970-pod

Dr. Joe Dispenza on Healing the Body and Transforming the Mind: https://link.chtbl.com/826-pod

Master Your Mind and Defy the Odds with David Goggins: https://link.chtbl.com/715-pod
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
